messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant. You're given a text and answer if the context is about a newly discovered cyber security threats, and describe the threat

is there any new cyber threat based on this text: CVE-2021-46888 An issue was discovered in hledger before 1.23. A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in toBloodhoundJson that allows an attacker to execute JavaScript by encoding user-controlled values in a payload with base64 and pars…
Yes, a new threat CVE-2021-46888 was dectected in hleger prior to 1.23. Attackers can run Javascript through XSS in toBloodhoundJson.

This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file search_teacher_result.php of the component POST Parameter Handler. The manipulat…
Yes, a vulnerability CVE-2023-2826 was found in SourceCodester Class Scheduling System 1.0. It affects the file search_teacher_result.php of the component POST Parameter Handler.
